name: .TIB
summary: Learn about .TIB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open TIB files and view their contents with Acronis True Image (Windows, Mac) or Acronis Backup (Windows, Linux). Simply double-clicking them will open the files.

If your TIB file was created by Acronis True Image 2017 or a later version or Acronis Backup 12.5, you may encounter an error message when attempting to delete the TIB file via Windows Explorer. The error is produced because Acronis's Self-protection feature does not allow users to delete TIB files outside Acronis True Image or Backup.
To circumvent this error message, use Acronis True Image or Backup to delete your TIB file.
